{{Infobox Pokéball |name = Diveball |image = [[File:Diveball.png]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Diveball''. |price = Variable |catchTime = 1s |catchRate = Variable *+15% in water environments *+0% all other environments |location =
*[[Diveball#Dungeons|Dungeons]] }} ==Description== The '''Diveball''' is a type of [[Pokéballs|Pokéball]]. It automatically tries to catch a wild Pokémon after defeating it if is the highest type of Pokéball active and there is a remaining supply in the Pokéball selector. ==Details== A specialized Pokéball to capture Pokémon with, it provides an increased catch rate in water environments. ===Rates=== {| class="wikitable" |+ Diveball |- ! Location !! Catch Chance Modifier |- | Water Environments || +15% |- | All other locations || +0% (Equal to Pokéball) |- |} ==Acquisition== ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/head‎|Diveballs}} {{LootItem|Aqua Hideout}} {{LootItem|Brooklet Hill}} {{LootItem|Pokéball Factory}} {{LootItem|Sealed Chamber}} {{LootItem|Seaside Cave}} {{LootItem|Seaward Cave}} |}
{{Pokéballs}}
